timeline.message: [HUDI-912] Refactor and relocate KeyGenerator to support more engines
[HUDI-912] Refactor and relocate KeyGenerator to support more engines

timeline.bodyText: This is what I meant in the first comment. we have to be backwards compatible with existing clients. It will be disruptive change for everyone to reconfigure all their jobs. Can we avoid renaming of keygenerator classes or changing their package names
timeline.author: vinothchandar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -68,7 +68,7 @@ public String bootstrap(
           help = "Bootstrap Index Class") final String bootstrapIndexClass,
       @CliOption(key = {"selectorClass"}, unspecifiedDefaultValue = "org.apache.hudi.client.bootstrap.selector.MetadataOnlyBootstrapModeSelector",
           help = "Selector class for bootstrap") final String selectorClass,
-      @CliOption(key = {"keyGeneratorClass"}, unspecifiedDefaultValue = "org.apache.hudi.keygen.SimpleKeyGenerator",
+      @CliOption(key = {"keyGeneratorClass"}, unspecifiedDefaultValue = "org.apache.hudi.keygen.SparkSimpleKeyGenerator",

replies.bodyText:
This is what I meant in the first comment. we have to be backwards compatible with existing clients. It will be disruptive change for everyone to reconfigure all their jobs. Can we avoid renaming of keygenerator classes or changing their package names

got it.
for speak, we leave the ket generator names untouched and rename it for other engines.
replies.author: wangxianghu

timeline.bodyText:
Those CommonKeyGenerators can be used for both flink and java engine.
I will add some flink specific KeyGenerators  when flink implementation(#2176) is  landed

timeline.bodyText: what the user sets is is actually DataSourceWriteOptions.RECORDKEY_FIELD_OPT_KEY(). So might be good to avoid duplicating this in KeyGeneratorOptions.RECORDKEY_FIELD_OPT_KEY . can we revert?
timeline.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText:
what the user sets is is actually DataSourceWriteOptions.RECORDKEY_FIELD_OPT_KEY(). So might be good to avoid duplicating this in KeyGeneratorOptions.RECORDKEY_FIELD_OPT_KEY . can we revert?

DataSourceWriteOptions has some hive and spark references in it.  it is a little inconvenient to move to hudi-client-common. should I refactor DataSourceWriteOptions ?
replies.author: wangxianghu

replies.bodyText: ah ok. no problem. this makes sense
replies.author: vinothchandar
